content.value: Actually web designer folks think about Typescript as an overhead to their applications and they are always nagging about the compile time of it but it is not a bad thing and it actually makes your coding alot faster! Type checking and the complains about stuff not being there like calling functions you never defined or using props in React that you are not passing down in visual studio code is really awesome!

My first post, i will post things about front-end technologies and programming in this blog, i also started my journey to AI a few days back with the article i wrote about NLP and also i had a little experiment with the KNN algorithm and finding out how accurate it is for character recognition. so, i will post about ML too. thanks for reading my first post! :)
